snippet: Thursday’s highlights from around the web include a profile of Yahoo’s chief executive, Marissa Mayer, which poses the question: has she done more harm than good to the tech giant? Plus, a visual history of Twitter’s board on the day a woman...
abstract: Thursday’s highlights from around the web include a profile of Yahoo’s chief executive, Marissa Mayer, which poses the question: has she done more harm than good to the tech giant? Plus, a visual history of Twitter’s board on the day a woman was appointed to it.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Yahoo's Geek Goddess, and a Visual History of Twitter Directors
